name: GitHub Page

on:
    push:
        branches:
            - gh-pages # master æ›´æ–°è§¦å‘

jobs:
    deploy:
        runs-on: ubuntu-18.04
        steps:
            - uses: actions/checkout@v2
              with:
                  submodules: true # clone submodules
                  fetch-depth: 0 # å…‹éš†æ‰€æœ‰å†å²ä¿¡æ¯

            - name: Setup Hugo
              uses: peaceiris/actions-hugo@v2
              with:
                  hugo-version: "0.111.3" # Hugo ç‰ˆæœ¬
                  extended: true # hugoæ’ä»¶ç‰ˆ Stackä¸»é¢˜ å¿…é¡»å¯ç”¨

            - name: Cache resources # ç¼“å­˜ resource æ–‡ä»¶åŠ å¿«ç”Ÿæˆé€Ÿåº¦
              uses: actions/cache@v2
              with:
                  path: resources
                  # æ£€æŸ¥ç…§ç‰‡æ–‡ä»¶å˜åŒ–
                  key: ${{ runner.os }}-hugocache-${{ hashFiles('content/**/*') }}
                  restore-keys: ${{ runner.os }}-hugocache-

            - name: Build # ç”Ÿæˆç½‘é¡µ åˆ é™¤æ— ç”¨ resource æ–‡ä»¶ å‰Šå‡ç©ºè¡Œ
              run: hugo --minify --gc

            - name: Deploy # éƒ¨ç½²åˆ° GitHub Page
              uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
              with:
                  # å¦‚æœåœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªä»“åº“ä¸‹ä½¿ç”¨è¯·ä½¿ç”¨ github_token å¹¶æ³¨é‡Š deploy_key
                  # github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
                  deploy_key: ${{ secrets.ACTIONS_DEPLOY_KEY }}

                  # å¦‚æœåœ¨åŒä¸€ä¸ªä»“åº“è¯·æ³¨é‡Š
                  external_repository: Tauzi/myblog # ä½ çš„ GitHub page ä»“åº“ example/example.github.io

                  publish_dir: ./public
                  user_name: "github-actions[bot]"
                  user_email: "github-actions[bot]@users.noreply.github.com"
                  full_commit_message: Deploy from ${{ github.repository }}@${{ github.sha }} ğŸš€

2.ç„¶ååœ¨åšå®¢æ ¹ç›®å½•æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹ä¸‹æ–°å»ºä¸€ä¸ªåä¸ºdeploy.shçš„æ–‡ä»¶ç”¨äºä¸€é”®éƒ¨ç½²åšå®¢,åœ¨deploy.shä¸­å¡«å…¥å¦‚ä¸‹å†…å®¹

public abstract class Buffer {  
  
 // Invariants: mark <= position <= limit <= capacity  
 private int mark = -1;  
 private int position = 0;  
 private int limit;  
 private int capacity;  
  
 // Used only by direct buffers  
 // NOTE: hoisted here for speed in JNI GetDirectBufferAddress  
 long address;  
  
 Buffer(int mark, int pos, int lim, int cap) { Â  Â  Â  // package-private  
 if (cap < 0)  
 throw new IllegalArgumentException("Negative capacity: " \+ cap);  
 this.capacity = cap;  
 limit(lim);  
 position(pos);  
 if (mark >= 0) {  
 if (mark > pos)  
 throw new IllegalArgumentException("mark > position: ("  
 \+ mark + " \> " \+ pos + ")");  
 this.mark = mark;  
 }  
 }

// ========== capacity ==========  
public final int capacity() {  
 return capacity;  
}  
  
// ========== position ==========  
public final int position() {  
 return position;  
}  
  
public final Buffer position(int newPosition) {  
 if ((newPosition > limit) || (newPosition < 0))  
 throw new IllegalArgumentException();  
 position = newPosition;  
 if (mark > position) mark = -1;  
 return this;  
}  
  
// ========== limit ==========  
public final int limit() {  
 return limit;  
}  
   
public final Buffer limit(int newLimit) {  
 if ((newLimit > capacity) || (newLimit < 0))  
 throw new IllegalArgumentException();  
 limit = newLimit;  
 if (position > limit) position = limit;  
 if (mark > limit) mark = -1;  
 return this;  
}  
  
// ========== mark ==========  
final int markValue() { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // package-private  
 return mark;  
}  
  
final void discardMark() { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // package-private  
 mark = -1;  
}  
  
// ========== æ•°ç»„ç›¸å…³ ==========  
public final int remaining() {  
 return limit - position;  
}  
  
public final boolean hasRemaining() {  
 return position < limit;  
}  
  
public abstract boolean hasArray();  
  
public abstract Object array();  
  
public abstract int arrayOffset();  
  
public abstract boolean isDirect();  
  
// ========== ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªè¯» / å†™ position ==========  
final int nextGetIndex() { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // package-private  
 if (position >= limit)  
 throw new BufferUnderflowException();  
 return position++;  
}  
  
final int nextGetIndex(int nb) { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // package-private  
 if (limit - position < nb)  
 throw new BufferUnderflowException();  
 int p = position;  
 position += nb;  
 return p;  
}  
  
final int nextPutIndex() { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // package-private  
 if (position >= limit)  
 throw new BufferOverflowException();  
 return position++;  
}  
  
final int nextPutIndex(int nb) { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â // package-private  
 if (limit - position < nb)  
 throw new BufferOverflowException();  
 int p = position;  
 position += nb;  
 return p;  
}  
  
final int checkIndex(int i) { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // package-private  
 if ((i < 0) || (i >= limit))  
 throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();  
 return i;  
}  
  
final int checkIndex(int i, int nb) { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // package-private  
 if ((i < 0) || (nb > limit - i))  
 throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();  
 return i;  
}  
  
// ========== å…¶å®ƒæ–¹æ³• ==========  
final void truncate() { Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // package-private  
 mark = -1;  
 position = 0;  
 limit = 0;  
 capacity = 0;  
}  
  
static void checkBounds(int off, int len, int size) { // package-private  
 if ((off | len | (off + len) | (size - (off + len))) < 0)  
 throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();  
}

 if (readyChannels == 0) {

 }  
 // è·å¾—å¯æ“ä½œçš„ Channel  
 Set selectedKeys = selector.selectedKeys();  
 // éå† SelectionKey æ•°ç»„  
 Iterator<SelectionKey> keyIterator = selectedKeys.iterator();  
 while (keyIterator.hasNext()) {  
 SelectionKey key = keyIterator.next();  
 if (key.isAcceptable()) {  
 // a connection was accepted by a ServerSocketChannel.  
 } else if (key.isConnectable()) {  
 // a connection was established with a remote server.  
 } else if (key.isReadable()) {  
 // a channel is ready for reading  
 } else if (key.isWritable()) {  
 // a channel is ready for writing  
 }  
 // ç§»é™¤  
 keyIterator.remove(); // <1>  
 }  
}

public static ByteBuffer read(SocketChannel channel) {

public static String newString(ByteBuffer buffer) {  
 buffer.flip();

 System.arraycopy(buffer.array(), buffer.position(), bytes, 0, buffer.remaining());

 }  
}

 38: Â  Â  @SuppressWarnings("Duplicates")  
 39: Â  Â  private void handleKeys() throws IOException {

 76: Â  Â  private void handleConnectableKey(SelectionKey key) throws IOException {

100: Â  Â  Â  Â  }  
101: Â  Â  }

103: Â  Â  @SuppressWarnings("Duplicates")  
104: Â  Â  private void handleWritableKey(SelectionKey key) throws ClosedChannelException {  
105: Â  Â  Â  Â  // Client Socket Channel

107:   
108: Â  Â  Â  Â  // éå†å“åº”é˜Ÿåˆ—  
109: Â  Â  Â  Â  List<String> responseQueue = (ArrayList<String>) key.attachment();  
110: Â  Â  Â  Â  for (String content : responseQueue) {  
111: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ‰“å°æ•°æ®  
112: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  System.out.println("å†™å…¥æ•°æ®ï¼š" \+ content);  
113: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  // è¿”å›  
114: Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  CodecUtil.write(clientSocketChannel, content);

116: Â  Â  Â  Â  responseQueue.clear();  
117:   
118: Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ³¨å†Œ Client Socket Channel åˆ° Selector  
119: Â  Â  Â  Â  clientSocketChannel.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_READ, responseQueue);  
120: Â  Â  }

122: Â  Â  public synchronized void send(String content) throws ClosedChannelException {  
123: Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ·»åŠ åˆ°å“åº”é˜Ÿåˆ—  
124: Â  Â  Â  Â  responseQueue.add(content);  
125: Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ‰“å°æ•°æ®  
126: Â  Â  Â  Â  System.out.println("å†™å…¥æ•°æ®ï¼š" \+ content);  
127: Â  Â  Â  Â  // æ³¨å†Œ Client Socket Channel åˆ° Selector  
128: Â  Â  Â  Â  clientSocketChannel.register(selector, SelectionKey.OP_WRITE, responseQueue);  
129: Â  Â  Â  Â  selector.wakeup();

132: Â  Â  public static void main(String\[\] args) throws IOException, InterruptedException {

            System.out.println("è¯·è¾“å…¥è¦å‘é€ç»™æœåŠ¡ç«¯çš„å†…å®¹ï¼š");

            writer.flush();

public static void main(String[] args) {
    try(ServerSocket server = new ServerSocket(8080)){    //å°†æœåŠ¡ç«¯åˆ›å»ºåœ¨ç«¯å£8080ä¸Š
        System.out.println("æ­£åœ¨ç­‰å¾…å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¿æ¥...");
        Socket socket = server.accept();

        BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(socket.getInputStream()));  //é€šè¿‡
        System.out.println("æ¥æ”¶åˆ°å®¢æˆ·ç«¯æ•°æ®ï¼š");

        OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(socket.getOutputStream());

}
